Package com.genband.kandy.api.services.groups

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IKandyGroup
    Contains the group's information
    IKandyGroupDestroyed
    Interface which represents the group's destroy action.
    IKandyGroupDownloadPathBuilder  
    IKandyGroupMessage
    Interface represent the KandyMessage for group messaging
    IKandyGroupParticipantJoined
    Interface which represents the participant's join action.
    IKandyGroupParticipantKicked
    Interface which represents the participant's kick action.
    IKandyGroupParticipantLeft
    Interface which represents the participant's left action.
    IKandyGroupService
    Interface represents the actions for group and group's participants management
    IKandyGroupUpdated
    Interface which represents the group's update action.
    KandyGroupServiceNotificationListener
    Listen to group Service notifications
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KandyGroup
    Contains the group's data
    KandyGroupParams
    Contains the KandyGroup params that could be updated and used for updating the group by passing parameters to the server
    KandyGroupParticipant
    Represents the group chat participants with properties
    KandyGroupResponseListener
    Listen to the KandyGroup actions(callbacks) and handles the responses
    KandyGroupSettings
    The settings object to configure service specific configurations
    KandyGroupsResponseListener
    Listen to the KandyGroup actions(callbacks) and handles the responses
